overview:
Matt has made a career of analyzing and successfully targeting leading waves and opportunities that emerge in the Media, Entertainment, and Technology sectors. From his early experience in the Motion Picture Industry, to his present involvement in Online Advertising and Video, he has consistently capitalized on this technological vision. Matt leverages this vision into successfully leading new and existing businesses to market dominance and decisive advantage against, or ahead of, competitors. He has led six such ventures to profitability and market dominance.

Matt gained much of his sales, marketing and business development seasoning while working on new ventures with such blue chip organizations as IBM, RCA, Columbia Pictures and ABC Television. He is a persuasive, bilingual evangelist, skilled in communicating complex topics with equal effectiveness in English or Spanish. He spent much of his childhood and professional life in Latin America, speaks fluent Spanish, and has a solid understanding of international cultures and mindsets.

degrees.subject: IRI Sales Institute
degrees.institution: Babson College, Olin School of Business

milestones.description: Joined Crowd Science as SVP Business & Partnership Development
milestones.source_description: Crowd Science Hires Advertising & Media Technology Executive Matt Pasternak as Senior Vice President of Business Development & Partnerships
